channel.title: md5 on gobai's blog
channel.description: Recent content in md5 on gobai's blog

item.title: 使用golang计算md5 sum
item.description: 代码 package main import ( "crypto/md5" "encoding/hex" "fmt" ) func main() { str := `this is the file content` md5sum := md5.Sum([]byte(str)) fmt.Printf("%x\n", md5sum) fmt.Printf("%s\n", hex.EncodeToString(md5sum[:])) } 输出 $ go run main.go 89b4f1823325ce4530cc264cc758baa7 89b4f1823325ce4530cc264cc758baa7
